sentences.en: A five-course meal including coffee, service and VAT is £30.
sentences.cn: 包括咖啡、服务费及增值税在内，一顿五道菜正餐的价格为30英镑。

sentences.en: All ministers, including the prime minister, will be answerable directly to him.
sentences.cn: 所有大臣，包括首相都将直接对他负责。

sentences.en: Each unit including the parent company has its own, local management.
sentences.cn: 包括母公司在内，每个单位都有自己的地方管理层。

sentences.en: Fifty officers, including frogmen and dog handlers, are searching for her.
sentences.cn: 包括蛙人和警犬训练员在内的50名警官正展开对她的搜寻。

sentences.en: He can perform an astonishing variety of acts, including mime and juggling.
sentences.cn: 他能表演好几种令人惊叹的把戏，包括哑剧和玩杂耍。

sentences.en: He'll be visiting four cities including Cagliari in Sardinia.
sentences.cn: 他将要访问4个城市，包括萨迪尼亚的卡利亚里。

sentences.en: It is available at £108, including VAT and delivery.
sentences.cn: 其价格为108英镑，包括增值税和送货费在内。

sentences.en: It is located within reach of many important Norman towns, including Bayeux.
sentences.cn: 它邻近许多重要的诺曼城镇，包括贝叶。

sentences.en: Only three people, including a policeman, will be privy to the facts.
sentences.cn: 只会允许3个人，其中包括一名警察，了解这些内情。

sentences.en: Overnight return flights cost from £349 including airport taxes.
sentences.cn: 当夜返程的航班至少需要349英镑，包括机场税。

sentences.en: Several of those present, including Weinberger, had contrary information.
sentences.cn: 几个在场的人，包括温博格，所掌握的信息截然不同。

sentences.en: The contributions employees pay give cover against sickness, including chronic invalidity.
sentences.cn: 员工的定期缴款用来支付生病的花费，包括长期病残的开销。

sentences.en: The price is £25.50, including postage and packing.
sentences.cn: 价钱是25.5英镑，含邮费和包装费。

sentences.en: There are all sorts of animals, including bears, pigs, kangaroos, and penguins.
sentences.cn: 有各种各样的动物，包括熊、猪、袋鼠和企鹅。

sentences.en: They've linked her with various men, including magnate Donald Trump.
sentences.cn: 他们把她与不同的男人扯上关系，包括大亨唐纳德·特朗普。

sentences.en: We'll put together a proposal, including detailed costings, free of charge.
sentences.cn: 我们将免费拟一份提案，其中包括详细的成本估算。

sentences.en: You’ll need a variety of skills, including leadership and negotiating.
sentences.cn: 你将需要各种技巧，包括领导能力和协商能力。

trans.tran_en: used to introduce something or someone that is part of a larger group or amount you have just mentioned

trans.tran_cn: 包括( include的现在分词)，包含，列入，包住
